name: Untitled & Unfinished
description:
Concept was to have the character be able to pull their island around and navigate to other islands that way. 

Most systems are fleshed out but doing all the content is just not doable as a solo, as well as having some unfortunate setbacks due to trying new things (like tilemaps and navmeshes) and not knowing the limits.

WASD movement

Space for hotbar item usage, numbers to swap to hotbar items.

Click on buttons or poles for interaction.
